description: During my internship at Kalpas Innovations Pvt. Ltd., located in Hubballi, Karnataka, India, I gained hands-on experience and in-depth knowledge in React.js, a popular JavaScript library for building user interfaces. Over the period of 29th December 2021 to 29th April 2022, I worked alongside a team of skilled developers, contributing to real-world projects and learning best practices in React.js development. During my internship, I had the opportunity to work on various tasks, such as creating interactive UI components, integrating APIs, optimizing performance, and troubleshooting issues. I also gained experience in using modern development tools and technologies, such as Axios, and Material-UI, to build efficient and scalable web applications.
